title: Vox Machina Ep. 12 - Dungeons & Dragons Campaign Tips
description: Join Matt Mercer as he walks aspiring GMs through some tips and tricks of the trade, then leads Dan Casey, Ify Nwadiwe, and Zac Eubanks through an entirely improvised one-shot!
content:encoded: Join Matt Mercer as he walks aspiring GMs through some tips and tricks of the trade, then leads Dan Casey, Ify Nwadiwe, and Zac Eubanks through an entirely improvised one-shot!
